descriptions: ["DescriptionParadise at The Marina! This Luxurious Four Bedrooms Six Bath Villa on the Marina is a dream home in a high-end community that's home to several mixed nationalities. Spanning over 5400 SF, this magnificent waterfront residence graced by soaring ceilings and wall-to-wall windows is a haven for gazing at full marina views from multiple vantage points. The 2-story great room with French doors to the rear deck is the dramatic focal point of the main level, accompanied by an elegant formal dining room, a tremendous chef's kitchen, family room with gorgeous built-ins. The divine master suite presents high ceilings, massive windows, a wide balcony overlooking the water, and an opulent ensuite bath will a soaking tub and separate glass shower. The lower level houses a large living room with wood floors. Laundry is conveniently located on the lower level.I am able and willing to provide exceptional service to those who are interested to buy, sell or rent.It will be my pleasure to assist you with all your queries. Please call to book a viewing."]
